Translations.Text: haq ye hai ke hum ne unhe haq pahoncha diya hai aur ye beshak jhute hai

na to Allah ne kisi ko bete banaya aur na us ke saath aur koyi maboodh hai, warna har maboodh apni maqlooq ko liye liye phirta aur har ek dosre par chad daudta, jo ausaaf ye batlaate hai, un se Allah paak(aur be niyaaz) hai
wo ghaayeb haazir jaanne waala hai aur jo shirk ye karte hai, us se baalaatar hai
aap dua kare ke aye mere parvardigaar! agar tu mujhe wo dikhaaye jis ka waada unhe diya ja raha hai
to aye rab! tu mujhe un zaalimo ke gruh mein na karna
hum jo kch waade unhe de rahe hai, sab aap ko dikha dene par yaqinan qaadir hai
buraayi ko us tariqe se door kare, jo saraasar bhalaayi waala ho, jo kuch ye bayaan karte hai, hum ba-qoobi waaqif hai
aur dua kare ke aye mere parvardigaar! main shaitaano ke was-waso se teri panaah chaahta hoon
aur aye rab main teri panaah chahta hoon ke wo mere paas aa jaaye
yahaan tak ke jab un mein se kisi ko mauth aane lagti hai, to kehta hai, aye mere parvardigaar! mujhe waapas lauta de
ke apni chohdi hoyi dunya mein ja kar nek amaal karlo, har giz aisa nahi hoga, ye to sirf ek qaul hai, jis ka ye qaayal hai, un ke pusht to ek hijaab hai, un ke dubaara ji uthne ke din tak
pas jab ke soor phoonk diya jayega, us din na to aapas ke rishtedaar hee rahenge aur na aapas ki poch gaj
jin ki taraazu ka palla bhaari ho gaya, wo to najaath waale ho gaye
aur jin ke taraazu ka palla halka ho gaya, ye hai wo jinhone apna nuqsaan aap kar liya, jo hamesha ke liye jahannam waasil hoye
un ke chehro ko aag jhulasti rahegi aur wo wahaan badh shakal bane hoye honge
